comments.body: According to [the doc](https://github.com/quilljs/delta/#methods-15), priority is only on `transform(other: DeltaStatic, priority: boolean)`.
According to this [doc](https://github.com/quilljs/delta/#transformposition), priority is only on transform(other: DeltaStatic, priority: boolean), not on `transformPosition(index)`

so here is the line of code which supports this: https://github.com/quilljs/quill/blob/5eac092fc43311e8cc40cc3a3507ced09aafbe1b/core/quill.js#L459

there's no documentation about it as far as i can see, and they don't have it in their own test cases. but it has been like that for a few years (at least), so i guess this is fine.
